sen.e: In 1183, in the face of the fierce attack by MINAMOTO no Yoshinaka, the Taira clan determined to fly from Kyoto; however, as Tomotada was still infant, his father ordered to leave Tomotada with menotogo (the son of a woman who provided breast-feed to a highborn baby) Tamenori TACHIBANA in Iga Province.
